verses.verse: כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לִמְשִׁיחוֹ֮ <S%H4899><s%> lim-shi-Cho to his anointed לְכ֣וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> le-Cho-resh to Cyrus אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- Whom הֶחֱזַ֣קְתִּי <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zak-ti I have holden בִֽימִינ֗וֹ <S%H3225><s%> vi-mi-No, whose right hand לְרַד־ <S%H7286><s%> le-rad- to subdue לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, nations וּמָתְנֵ֥י <S%H4975><s%> u-ma-te-Nei the loins מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim of kings אֲפַתֵּ֑חַ <S%H6605><s%> 'a-fat-Te-ach; him and I will loose לִפְתֹּ֤חַ <S%H6605><s%> lif-To-ach to open לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before דְּלָתַ֔יִם <S%H1817><s%> de-la-Ta-yim, him the two leaved gates וּשְׁעָרִ֖ים <S%H8179><s%> u-she-'a-Rim and the gates לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִסָּגֵֽרוּ׃ <S%H5462><s%> yis-sa-Ge-ru. shall not be shut

אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha before אֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech, will go וַהֲדוּרִ֖ים <S%H1921><s%> va-ha-du-Rim the crooked places; אֹושִׁר 'o-shir כאֲיַשֵּׁ֑ר <S%H3474><s%> 'a-yash-Sher; direct קדַּלְת֤וֹת <S%H1817><s%> dal-Tot the gates נְחוּשָׁה֙ <S%H5154><s%> ne-chu-Shah of brass אֲשַׁבֵּ֔ר <S%H7665><s%> 'a-shab-Ber, I will break in pieces וּבְרִיחֵ֥י <S%H1280><s%> u-ve-ri-Chei the bars בַרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> var-Zel of iron אֲגַדֵּֽעַ׃ <S%H1438><s%> 'a-gad-De-a'. and cut in sunder

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will give לְךָ֙ le-Cha אוֹצְר֣וֹת <S%H214><s%> otz-Rot thee the treasures חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> Cho-shech, of darkness וּמַטְמֻנֵ֖י <S%H4301><s%> u-mat-mu-Nei and hidden riches מִסְתָּרִ֑ים <S%H4565><s%> mis-ta-Rim; of secret places לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that תֵּדַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> te-Da', that thou mayest know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that it אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni is I יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that I the LORD הַקּוֹרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> hak-ko-Re which call בְשִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> ve-shim-Cha [thee] by thy name אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei [am] the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an the sake עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di my servant's יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, For Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El sake and Israel בְּחִירִ֑י <S%H972><s%> be-chi-Ri; mine elect וָאֶקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> va-'ek-Ra I have even called לְךָ֙ le-Cha בִּשְׁמֶ֔ךָ <S%H8034><s%> bish-Me-cha, thee by thy name אֲכַנְּךָ֖ <S%H3655><s%> 'a-chan-ne-Cha I have surnamed וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not יְדַעְתָּֽנִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Ta-ni. thee though thou hast not known

אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od, other זוּלָתִ֖י <S%H2108><s%> zu-la-Ti beside אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein is no אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; and [there is] none else [there is] no God אֲאַזֶּרְךָ֖ <S%H247><s%> 'a-'az-zer-Cha me I girded וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not יְדַעְתָּֽנִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Ta-ni. thee though thou hast not known

לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of יֵדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> ye-de-'U, That they may know מִמִּזְרַח־ <S%H4217><s%> mi-miz-rach- from the rising שֶׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> she-mesh of the sun וּמִמַּ֣עֲרָבָ֔הּ <S%H4628><s%> u-mi-Ma-'a-ra-Vah, and from the west כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- there אֶ֖פֶס <S%H657><s%> 'E-fes that [there is] none בִּלְעָדָ֑י <S%H1107><s%> bil-'a-Dai; beside אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> od. other

יוֹצֵ֥ר <S%H3335><s%> yo-Tzer I form אוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> 'Or the light וּבוֹרֵ֣א <S%H1254><s%> u-vo-Re and create חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> Cho-shech, darkness עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh I make שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom peace וּב֣וֹרֵא <S%H1254><s%> u-Vo-re and create רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; evil אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I the LORD עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh do כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh. these ס sa-Mek

הַרְעִ֤יפוּ <S%H7491><s%> har-'I-fu Drop down שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim ye heavens מִמַּ֔עַל <S%H4605><s%> mi-Ma-'al, from above וּשְׁחָקִ֖ים <S%H7834><s%> u-she-cha-Kim and let the skies יִזְּלוּ־ <S%H5140><s%> yiz-ze-lu- pour down צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek; righteousness תִּפְתַּח־ <S%H6605><s%> tif-tach- open אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz let the earth וְיִפְרוּ־ <S%H6509><s%> ve-yif-ru- and let them bring forth יֶ֗שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> Ye-sha', salvation וּצְדָקָ֤ה <S%H6666><s%> u-tze-da-Kah and let righteousness תַצְמִ֙יחַ֙ <S%H6779><s%> tatz-Mi-ach spring up יַ֔חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad, together אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I the LORD בְּרָאתִֽיו׃ <S%H1254><s%> be-ra-Tiv. have created ס sa-Mek

ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho, Woe רָ֚ב <S%H7378><s%> rav unto him that striveth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יֹ֣צְר֔וֹ <S%H3335><s%> yo-tze-Ro, with his Maker חֶ֖רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> Che-res [Let] the potsherd אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חַרְשֵׂ֣י <S%H2789><s%> char-Sei [strive] with the potsherds אֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> 'a-da-Mah; of the earth הֲיֹאמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> ha-yo-Mar say חֹ֤מֶר <S%H2563><s%> Cho-mer Shall the clay לְיֹֽצְרוֹ֙ <S%H3335><s%> le-yo-tze-Ro to him that fashioneth מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh, it What makest וּפָעָלְךָ֖ <S%H6467><s%> u-fa-'a-le-Cha thou;or thy work אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- has יָדַ֥יִם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Da-yim able לֽוֹ׃ lo. ס sa-Mek

ה֛וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho Woe אֹמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mer unto him that saith לְאָ֖ב <S%H1><s%> le-'Av unto [his] father מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What תּוֹלִ֑יד <S%H3205><s%> to-Lid; What begettest וּלְאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> u-le-'ish-Shah thou;or to the woman מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- to what תְּחִילִֽין׃ <S%H2342><s%> te-chi-Lin. What hast thou brought forth ס sa-Mek

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ke-Doosh the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְיֹצְר֑וֹ <S%H3335><s%> ve-yo-tze-Ro; and his Maker הָאֹתִיּ֣וֹת <S%H857><s%> ha-'o-ti-Yot me of things to come שְׁאָל֔וּנִי <S%H7592><s%> she-'a-Lu-ni, Ask עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- about בָּנַ֛י <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nai concerning my sons וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- concerning פֹּ֥עַל <S%H6467><s%> Po-'al and concerning the work יָדַ֖י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dai of my hands תְּצַוֻּֽנִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> te-tzav-Vu-ni. command

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi is I עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti I have made אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, the earth וְאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ve-'a-Dam man עָלֶ֣יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha and בָרָ֑אתִי <S%H1254><s%> va-Ra-ti; and created אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni, my יָדַי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dai upon it I [even] my hands נָט֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> na-Tu have stretched out שָׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim, the heavens וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all צְבָאָ֖ם <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Am and all their host צִוֵּֽיתִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vei-ti. have I commanded

אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I הַעִירֹתִ֣הֽוּ <S%H5782><s%> ha-'i-ro-Ti-hu I have raised him up בְצֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> ve-Tze-dek, in righteousness וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all דְּרָכָ֖יו <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chav all his ways אֲיַשֵּׁ֑ר <S%H3474><s%> 'a-yash-Sher; and I will direct הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- He יִבְנֶ֤ה <S%H1129><s%> yiv-Neh he shall build עִירִי֙ <S%H5892><s%> 'i-Ri my city וְגָלוּתִ֣י <S%H1546><s%> ve-ga-lu-Ti my captives יְשַׁלֵּ֔חַ <S%H7971><s%> ye-shal-Le-ach, and he shall let go לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo Without בִמְחִיר֙ <S%H4242><s%> vim-Chir not for price וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Without בְשֹׁ֔חַד <S%H7810><s%> ve-Sho-chad, nor reward אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot. of hosts פ Peh

כֹּ֣ה׀ <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God יְגִ֨יעַ <S%H3018><s%> ye-Gi-a' The labour מִצְרַ֥יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וּֽסְחַר־ <S%H5505><s%> u-se-char- and merchandise כּוּשׁ֮ <S%H3568><s%> kush of Ethiopia וּסְבָאִים֮ <S%H5436><s%> u-se-va-'Im and of the Sabeans אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei men מִדָּה֒ <S%H4060><s%> mid-Dah of stature עָלַ֤יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich and יַעֲבֹ֙רוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-Vo-ru shall come over וְלָ֣ךְ ve-Lach יִֽהְי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu, become אַחֲרַ֣יִךְ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Ra-yich after יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Le-chu, will walk בַּזִּקִּ֖ים <S%H2131><s%> baz-zik-Kim thee in chains יַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-Vo-ru; they shall come over וְאֵלַ֤יִךְ <S%H413><s%> ve-'e-La-yich and יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> yish-ta-chav-Vu and they shall fall down אֵלַ֣יִךְ <S%H413><s%> 'e-La-yich to you יִתְפַּלָּ֔לוּ <S%H6419><s%> yit-pal-La-lu, unto thee they shall make supplication אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Surely בָּ֥ךְ <S%H99999><s%> bach אֵ֛ל <S%H410><s%> 'el unto thee [saying] Surely God וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od else אֶ֥פֶס <S%H657><s%> 'E-fes [is] in thee and [there is] none else [there is] no אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. God

אָכֵ֕ן <S%H403><s%> 'a-Chen Verily אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> 'el thou [art] a God מִסְתַּתֵּ֑ר <S%H5641><s%> mis-tat-Ter; that hidest אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei thyself O God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> mo-Shi-a'. the Saviour

בּ֥וֹשׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Boo-shu They shall be ashamed וְגַֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and even נִכְלְמ֖וּ <S%H3637><s%> nich-le-Mu and also confounded כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam; all יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together הָלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-le-Chu all of them they shall go בַכְּלִמָּ֔ה <S%H3639><s%> vak-ke-lim-Mah, to confusion חָרָשֵׁ֖י <S%H2796><s%> cha-ra-Shei [that are] makers צִירִֽים׃ <S%H6736><s%> tzi-Rim. of idols
